short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy ChatGPT correspondence with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy entire chat conversations with just one click using ChatGPT Clipper. This lightweight extension intelligently separates ChatGPT-generated messages from human-generated messages for neat and organized transcripts. Perfect for work, school, or personal use on OpenAI's ChatGPT platform.
